dimensions.label: Risk Taker
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertain situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach challenges with confidence and boldness, taking calculated risks to achieve goals.
Your FarTwin will exercise extreme caution when faced with uncertainty, prioritizing stability over potential rewards.

dimensions.label: Humor Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin will use sarcasm and wit to make pointed jokes, often catching others off guard.
Your FarTwin will rely on slapstick humor and lighthearted jokes to diffuse tense situations and bring laughter.

dimensions.label: Analytical Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will rely on cold, hard logic to make decisions and solve problems, dismissing emotional appeals when necessary.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and rely on gut feelings to guide decision-making and problem-solving.

dimensions.label: Leadership Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach leadership?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and assert dominance, making tough decisions without hesitation.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others to achieve shared goals, prioritizing teamwork over individual accomplishments.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin will channel their creativity into visual arts, music, or writing to convey emotions and ideas.
Your FarTwin will express themselves through interactive experiences, such as role-playing or escape rooms, to bring their imagination to life.

dimensions.label: Technical Skillset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will dive headfirst into complex technical problems, seeking to master new skills and tackle challenging projects.
Your FarTwin will focus on applying existing technical knowledge to solve real-world problems, prioritizing functionality over innovation.

dimensions.label: Social Connection Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin form relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin will seek out social interactions and connections, often taking the lead in new friendships or professional networks.
Your FarTwin will prefer one-on-one relationships or small, intimate groups, feeling drained by large social gatherings or crowded spaces.

dimensions.label: Personal Boundaries
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin set and maintain personal boundaries?

options.description: Your FarTwin will fiercely defend their personal space, setting clear limits with others to protect their time and energy.
Your FarTwin will be more adaptable in establishing boundaries, adjusting to the needs of those around them while still prioritizing self-care.
